channel.title: Project on CEDIS
channel.description: Recent content in Project on CEDIS

item.title: HCI Journey Project
item.description: Teaching project, “Human-Computer Interaction” course, an educational innovation promoted by CEDIS in the Software Engineering course at the University of Brasília

item.title: Feudal Dawn Project
item.description: A teaching project, an educational innovation promoted by CEDIS at the University of Brasília.

item.title: Canal Ciência Project
item.description: A research project in partnership with IBICT and funded by FINATEC, aimed at enhancing the user experience of the Canal Ciência through the use of gamification.

item.title: Green Software Development Project
item.description: This project aims to highlight the importance of understanding the field of Green Software Development and bringing it into companies.

item.title: Digital Transformation Project
item.description: The Brazilian Federal Government’s Public Services Digital Transformation project involves research, development, and innovation in methodologies, models, and tools that promote the automation and digitalization of public services.

item.title: Laguna Project
item.description: This project aims to extend the massive processing of a data lake using a cloud architecture, utilizing Amazon Web Services (AWS) as the provider.

item.title: Project DFCris
item.description: A research project in partnership with IBICT and funded by FAP/DF.
